How can I remote connect to my server without using ssh ?
depends what you want to do..

but what do you do on the server, what tasks?
Hosting, Broadcasting TV etc
if the tv hosting only has a GUI interface then you could use vnc through an ssh tunnel

not very secure....

the 4s and 5s are fine, 7s can be dodgey especially how weak ftp is with security

ntop watches the interface itself
